Package alledrogo.controller

Class ProductHandlerController

java.lang.Object
alledrogo.controller.ProductHandlerController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/product/handling") public class ProductHandlerController extends Object
Api endpoint class, provides /product/handling endpoint to manipulate products in database.

    • saveProduct

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> saveProduct(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid AddProductRequest addProductRequest, @RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String token)
      Creates new ProductEntity object filled with addProductRequest data and saves it into the database
      Parameters:
      addProductRequest - NotNull obj. with data for ProductEntity
      token - token of logged in user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity obj. with MessageResponse obj. containing message

    • deleteProduct

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteProduct(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String token)
      Check if current user is owner of the item, if so deletes ProductEntity object from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - LONG id of the object to delete
      token - token of logged in user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity obj. with MessageResponse obj. containing message

    • buyProduct

      @PutMapping("/{id}/buy") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> buyProduct(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String token)
      Checks if user can buy item and if so "buys" item for the current user and transfers funds between accounts.
      Parameters:
      id - LONG id of the object to buy
      token - token of logged in user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity obj. with MessageResponse obj. containing message
